title: The Avenger Vol. 1: Justice, Inc. & The Yellow Hoard
description: Reprints the Avenger novels Justice, Inc. (Avenger Magazine, 9/39) and The Yellow Hoard (Avenger Magazine, 10/39), both by Paul Ernst writing as Kenneth Robeson. Also includes Tear Drop Tank, "an Avenger radio classic," with new historical essays by Will Murray and Anthony Tollin.
author: Kenneth Robeson
